00064 "{\n"
00065 "       if(b3Fabs(v.x)>1e-6 || b3Fabs(v.y)>1e-6 || b3Fabs(v.z)>1e-6)    \n"

00067 "       return true;\n"
00068 "}\n"
00069 "inline int    b3MaxDot( b3Float4ConstArg vec, __global const b3Float4* vecArray, int vecLen, float* dotOut )\n"
00070 "{\n"
00071 "    float maxDot = -B3_INFINITY;\n"
00072 "    int i = 0;\n"
00073 "    int ptIndex = -1;\n"
00074 "    for( i = 0; i < vecLen; i++ )\n"
00075 "    {\n"
00076 "        float dot = b3Dot3F4(vecArray[i],vec);\n"
00077 "            \n"
00078 "        if( dot > maxDot )\n"
00079 "        {\n"
00080 "            maxDot = dot;\n"
00081 "            ptIndex = i;\n"
00082 "        }\n"
00083 "    }\n"
00084 "       b3Assert(ptIndex>=0);\n"
00085 "    if (ptIndex<0)\n"
00086 "       {\n"
00087 "               ptIndex = 0;\n"
00088 "       }\n"
00089 "    *dotOut = maxDot;\n"
00090 "    return ptIndex;\n"
00091 "}\n"

00169 "//     batching on the GPU\n"
00170 "__kernel void CreateBatchesBruteForce( __global struct b3Contact4Data* gConstraints,   __global const u32* gN, __global const u32* gStart, int m_staticIdx )\n"
00171 "{\n"
00172 "       int wgIdx = GET_GROUP_IDX;\n"
00173 "       int lIdx = GET_LOCAL_IDX;\n"
00174 "       \n"
00175 "       const int m_n = gN[wgIdx];\n"
00176 "       const int m_start = gStart[wgIdx];\n"
00177 "               \n"
00178 "       if( lIdx == 0 )\n"
00179 "       {\n"
00180 "               for (int i=0;i<m_n;i++)\n"
00181 "               {\n"
00182 "                       int srcIdx = i+m_start;\n"
00183 "                       int batchIndex = i;\n"
00184 "                       gConstraints[ srcIdx ].m_batchIdx = batchIndex; \n"
00185 "               }\n"
00186 "       }\n"
00187 "}\n"
00188 "#define CHECK_SIZE (WG_SIZE)\n"
00189 "u32 readBuf(__local u32* buff, int idx)\n"
00190 "{\n"
00191 "       idx = idx % (32*CHECK_SIZE);\n"
00192 "       int bitIdx = idx%32;\n"
00193 "       int bufIdx = idx/32;\n"
00194 "       return buff[bufIdx] & (1<<bitIdx);\n"
00195 "}\n"
00196 "void writeBuf(__local u32* buff, int idx)\n"
00197 "{\n"
00198 "       idx = idx % (32*CHECK_SIZE);\n"
00199 "       int bitIdx = idx%32;\n"
00200 "       int bufIdx = idx/32;\n"
00201 "       buff[bufIdx] |= (1<<bitIdx);\n"
00202 "       //atom_or( &buff[bufIdx], (1<<bitIdx) );\n"
00203 "}\n"
00204 "u32 tryWrite(__local u32* buff, int idx)\n"
00205 "{\n"
00206 "       idx = idx % (32*CHECK_SIZE);\n"
00207 "       int bitIdx = idx%32;\n"
00208 "       int bufIdx = idx/32;\n"
00209 "       u32 ans = (u32)atom_or( &buff[bufIdx], (1<<bitIdx) );\n"
00210 "       return ((ans >> bitIdx)&1) == 0;\n"
00211 "}\n"
00212 "//     batching on the GPU\n"
00213 "__kernel void CreateBatchesNew( __global struct b3Contact4Data* gConstraints, __global const u32* gN, __global const u32* gStart, __global int* batchSizes, int staticIdx )\n"
00214 "{\n"
00215 "       int wgIdx = GET_GROUP_IDX;\n"
00216 "       int lIdx = GET_LOCAL_IDX;\n"
00217 "       const int numConstraints = gN[wgIdx];\n"
00218 "       const int m_start = gStart[wgIdx];\n"
00219 "       b3Contact4Data_t tmp;\n"
00220 "       \n"
00221 "       __local u32 ldsFixedBuffer[CHECK_SIZE];\n"
00222 "               \n"
00223 "       \n"
00224 "       \n"
00225 "       \n"
00226 "       \n"
00227 "       if( lIdx == 0 )\n"
00228 "       {\n"
00229 "       \n"
00230 "               \n"
00231 "               __global struct b3Contact4Data* cs = &gConstraints[m_start];    \n"
00232 "       \n"
00233 "               \n"
00234 "               int numValidConstraints = 0;\n"
00235 "               int batchIdx = 0;\n"
00236 "               while( numValidConstraints < numConstraints)\n"
00237 "               {\n"
00238 "                       int nCurrentBatch = 0;\n"
00239 "                       //      clear flag\n"
00240 "       \n"
00241 "                       for(int i=0; i<CHECK_SIZE; i++) \n"
00242 "                               ldsFixedBuffer[i] = 0;          \n"
00243 "                       for(int i=numValidConstraints; i<numConstraints; i++)\n"
00244 "                       {\n"
00245 "                               int bodyAS = cs[i].m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit;\n"
00246 "                               int bodyBS = cs[i].m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit;\n"
00247 "                               int bodyA = abs(bodyAS);\n"
00248 "                               int bodyB = abs(bodyBS);\n"
00249 "                               bool aIsStatic = (bodyAS<0) || bodyAS==staticIdx;\n"
00250 "                               bool bIsStatic = (bodyBS<0) || bodyBS==staticIdx;\n"
00251 "                               int aUnavailable = aIsStatic ? 0 : readBuf( ldsFixedBuffer, bodyA);\n"
00252 "                               int bUnavailable = bIsStatic ? 0 : readBuf( ldsFixedBuffer, bodyB);\n"
00253 "                               \n"
00254 "                               if( aUnavailable==0 && bUnavailable==0 ) // ok\n"
00255 "                               {\n"
00256 "                                       if (!aIsStatic)\n"
00257 "                                       {\n"
00258 "                                               writeBuf( ldsFixedBuffer, bodyA );\n"
00259 "                                       }\n"
00260 "                                       if (!bIsStatic)\n"
00261 "                                       {\n"
00262 "                                               writeBuf( ldsFixedBuffer, bodyB );\n"
00263 "                                       }\n"
00264 "                                       cs[i].m_batchIdx = batchIdx;\n"
00265 "                                       if (i!=numValidConstraints)\n"
00266 "                                       {\n"
00267 "                                               tmp = cs[i];\n"
00268 "                                               cs[i] = cs[numValidConstraints];\n"
00269 "                                               cs[numValidConstraints]  = tmp;\n"
00270 "                                       }\n"
00271 "                                       numValidConstraints++;\n"
00272 "                                       \n"
00273 "                                       nCurrentBatch++;\n"
00274 "                                       if( nCurrentBatch == SIMD_WIDTH)\n"
00275 "                                       {\n"
00276 "                                               nCurrentBatch = 0;\n"
00277 "                                               for(int i=0; i<CHECK_SIZE; i++) \n"
00278 "                                                       ldsFixedBuffer[i] = 0;\n"
00279 "                                               \n"
00280 "                                       }\n"
00281 "                               }\n"
00282 "                       }//for\n"
00283 "                       batchIdx ++;\n"
00284 "               }//while\n"
00285 "               \n"
00286 "               batchSizes[wgIdx] = batchIdx;\n"
00287 "       }//if( lIdx == 0 )\n"
00288 "       \n"
00289 "       //return batchIdx;\n"
00290 "}\n"
